page.title: 04CULLODEN ACADEMY (EVENING)
page.content: During the day{Culloden Academy}is used as a school but at night it is open to the public for the use of the sports facilities. There are many sports to choose from, including Badminton, indoor and outdoor Tennis, Basketball, Football, Fencing, Keepfit classes but the main attraction is the swimming pool. There is a membership available for all the sports, and with a membership the addmission is half price(30p).Many of the sports are taught,and in the swimming pool life saving is taught as well as swimming. The sports are also open to the public during the holidays every day. There also are special sessions open to Old Aged Pensioners and Mothers and Toddlers.It is hoped that the school will be used for conferences in the future.
